description: Try our easy to follow Potato Salad with BBQ Lamb Chops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Potato Salad with BBQ Lamb Chops
name: Potato Salad with BBQ Lamb Chops Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve potato salad with lamb. Tip 1: You can add some barbecued rindless bacon rashers, chopped for extra flavour. Tip 2: If you like a creamy dressing on your potatoes substitute lemon and oil for 1/2 sour cream and 1/2 whole egg mayonnaise whisked with a little water. Tip 3: This potato salad is best served warm
